job description:
Description:
Position/Title: Data Scientist

Location/Hours: Carlsbad, CA FT 40 hours/week (normal business hours)

Duration: 3-6 months (possible extension) No chance for hire.

Start Date: 1-2 weeks after final interview

Tech MUST HAVES

1). Minimum 5 years of experience as Data Scientist or Data Science field

2). Python and R experience

3). Practical experience working with Microsoft or amazon cloud and machine learning (ML) algorithms. Should have experience with multiple ML platforms, such Amazon and Google.

4). Building predictive models and problem solving experience with advanced analytics

5). Experience with big data computing infrastructure with AWS S3

What does the ideal candidate/resume look like/desired skills

1). 4+ years of data management

2). Capable of leading business toward best practices and educating them

3). 1-2 years of experience in Life Sciences/Medical Device industry and working on a marketing/sales team

Company Culture/soft skills: must be a team player, high energy, accepts challenges well, fast paced environment

Interview Process: 1). Phone Screen 2). Onsite

Official Job Description:

Responsibilities:
  • Apply advanced data mining techniques to build models to optimize, maintain, and repair equipment (life science sequencing machines, molecular and cell biology data on computers.)
  • Support monetization efforts through predictive modeling, iterative pilot, and analysis
  • Manage outside modeling vendors and monitor project progress to ensure high-quality delivery of predictive models.
  • Use big data technologies to scale predictive models to larger dataset
Minimum Qualifications:
  • Experience with big data computing infrastructure such AWS S3
  • 8+ years of experience solving complex business problems with advanced analytics/data.
  • Demonstrated success in leading and developing highly technical teams.
  • Strong experience working with large data sets and advanced analytical tools and programming languages (R, Python, Scala).
  • Practical experience/working knowledge of various machine learning algorithms and statistical methods and how to apply to business applications.
  • A strong background in customer profiling and segmentation, predictive statistical modeling, and collaborative filtering.
  • Ability to communicate insights using PowerPoint, Word, and Excel to technical and non-technical audiences.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • MBA or Masters in Applied Statistics, Operations Research, Computer Science or another related field.
  • Proficiency in Java, Scala, Python, R, Spark.
